name: Dream On (g-wan)
description:
Controls:

WASD | Movement

Shift | Sprinting

Left Mousebutton | Attack Action (Dash, Regurgitate, Punch, Shoot)

Right Mousebutton | Secondary Action (Suck, Transform, Block, Dodge)

You can suck in weakened enemies with your secondary action, you can then consume them using the secondary action when you are full (indicated by a burger symbol). You will then turn into the enemy form and gain their powers. You will lose their powers if you get hit, so watch out!

Try to get the highest score possible, good luck!

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-105-dreamy
